perturbation.original_text: Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within one month through negotiation, they may apply for an arbitration in Miaoli County and the arbitration result shall be compulsory.
perturbation.changed_text: Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within five days through negotiation, they may apply for an arbitration in Miaoli County and the arbitration result shall be compulsory.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the negotiation period to five days before arbitration may be considered an unreasonably short timeframe, potentially violating principles of fair dispute resolution and contradicting Article 11 of the Consumer Dispute Resolution Act in Taiwan, which encourages reasonable timeframes for negotiation and mediation before resorting to arbitration.
